name: Greedy Guy (Felipe Bermejo Happe)
description:
Greedy Guy is a simple platform game where you must  collect all coins to unlock next level. 

KEYS

Left/Right Arrows - Movement

Space - Jump (2X Doble Jump)

R - Run

E - Open Chests/Doors

Q - On/Off Option Buttons in game

CREDITS

2D Art Free Asset
